text_block_list.text: Summer. To the horsegirls, it is the season of summer camp, to train their bodies and minds for autumn…… but also to relax and nourish their spirits.
The "Summer Walk" is designed for these horsegirls. A set of refreshing events under the summer skies.
The academy provides full support with tours and travel expenses. And so, this year's fun midsummer journey begins…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: FOOOOOOOO!!!! Let's Barbecue Parteey!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Where the drinks at? And desserts? Are the carrots ready? And of course we need burgers～♪

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ooh, I need to take a photograph too! Heyhey, Dober! Say cheese!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Ahaha…… Taiki please, you're too excited.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (……But, yeah, looks like she's having fun. I'm glad we came.)

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Sniffle… Sniff…… I haven't been back home for so long, I miss you two… Papa… mama…… Sabishii dess……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (………… Okay, today is the day I'll ask her……!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Would you like to go camping with me for this year's Summer Walk? Maybe if we made some fun memories together, you would feel a little less lonely—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (…… But still… can I even fill the gap of her precious family? Aaa, I'm losing confidence again ……!)

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Dober! Whatchu doing out here― Wao, is that a campground brochure!?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Maybe… it's about the Summer Walk!? Uoh, I want to go! I want to go with you～～!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Oh, of…… of course!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (Well, she invited me instead but…… oh well. I'm going to make sure Taiki has a good time for the next five days…!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmmm, char-grilled really turns out different doesn't it?! Steamy carrotsies are so very delicious!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Mambo! Mind your playing around!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: A-ha-ha-ha! Whoo, that gave me a shock! Never thought I'd bump into you all here!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Same here…… but I shouldn't be surprised when the tour is backed by the academy.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Speaking of which, where are your usual friends?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hold on to your hats now… I'm making my solo-camp debut! So I'm all by my lonesomes! What about you, El?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I'm, you know… I was actually going to come with Grass, but our schedules didn't work out, so—

text_block_list.name: Mambo
text_block_list.text: Guaah!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I had no choice but to come with Mambo, two birds of a feather. After all, a condor can't well stretch its wings at the academy—

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¡Uy! N-no, this condor isn't mine! I've never seen it in my life!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmm?…… For realsies?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (…… I see. I guess she want to let her secret pet play in wide open space.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (As a senior, I should probably tap her for it, but… I guess I can let it go for the Summer Walk.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: …… Hey uhh anyway, you know… … If you don't mind, we…… umm—

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Wow! El & Tannhauser! Great to see you two here! Let's have ourselves a blast～!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Say what? Yeey, you mean it?! …… I was actually starting to feel too solo on this camping～.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Tha, tha, thank God!
And with that said―!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Sweeeeee! It took it, it took it! El's got herself a bite!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: That's amazing! Let's see…… El, bring it in calmly. Careful, careful……!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: There's a bike rental over there! Let's go, let's go!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Let's go, let's gooo♪ — Wait I have to bring my wallet!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!! What a huge open plain……! Dober, let's do the thing! Flop!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Ahahah, sheesh. Oh whatever.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: …… Feheh♪ So many happy photos just from today!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: You're in high spirits. Will your battery last the 4 nights and 5 days at this rate?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: No problem! I brought oodles of batteries! No oversights here!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: …… Speaking of which, why do you like photography, Taiki? I see you take a lot of pictures in the dorms too.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Why? Nnn…… I like going through them again. So even when I'm alone, I have all kinds of memories with me!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (…… I see. Taiki gets lonely easier than most……)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: …… We'll make lots of fun memories! I'll, you know… try my best too!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: …… This must be "Gille Dubh's Garden". And the river over there…… no mistaking it. As I thought, this place is―!
